name: FnP
description: FNP (formerly Ferns N Petals) is a leading, global gifting brand that offers a comprehensive range of products for every special moment. Serving as a one-stop solution for all things gifting – we are in the business of transforming occasions and festivals into cherished memories. FNP's gift collection extends across flowers, cakes, plants, chocolates, personalized pieces, hampers & more – catering to every emotion and relationship.
features: FNP was known for its extensive collection of flowers, bouquets, and plants.
The ability to order flowers and gifts for same-day or scheduled delivery.
International delivery options, allowing customers to send gifts to loved ones abroad.
Headline: India's Largest Gifting Chain
ShortDescription: Celebrate Occasions with India's #1 Online Gift Store

Highlights.name: Continuous Transformation
Highlights.description: Experiment, Innovation, Continuous Improvement, Curiosity, Sharing & seeking knowledge, Collaboration, Being Devil's advocate, Introspection, Resilience, Agility, Adaptability, Diversity

Highlights.name: Collective Growth
Highlights.description: Profitability, Cost-consciousness, Inclusiveness, Sustainability, Community service, Social Responsibility

Highlights.name: It still provide gift baskets or hampers combining flowers, chocolates, greeting cards.
Highlights.description: Trustworthiness, Commitment, Integrity, Ethics, Fair-play, Compliance, Transparency, Persistence, Ownership, Finishing to the end, Doing the most difficult task first

enhanced_description: FnP (formerly Ferns N Petals) is a leading global gifting brand, recognized as India's largest and #1 online gift store. It offers a comprehensive range of products including flowers, cakes, plants, chocolates, personalized items, and gift hampers, serving as a one-stop solution for various special moments and occasions. FnP provides flexible delivery options, including same-day, scheduled, and international delivery. Within the HR context, FnP is positioned as a solution to improve employee happiness and engagement, supporting total rewards, employee recognition programs, and overall employee well-being initiatives.
competitive_advantages: Market leadership in India as the largest gifting chain and #1 online gift store
Extensive global reach with international delivery options
Wide range of gift options including flowers, cakes, plants, chocolates, personalized items, and hampers
Flexible and fast delivery services (same-day and scheduled delivery)
roi_benefits: Improved effectiveness of employee recognition initiatives
